Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "It's... somewhere near... Remember the teachings from tactics class... First, analyze the geography, and if the rescue target is an adult male, walk a sloped path according to the size ratio...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Where are your wounds? And your pain scale?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "It's pointless, medic. The ground forces have all retreated, and when the Corrupted move in here, no one's going to live.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "It's an honor to have met you in my last moments, but... please just run, you'll save more people if you live longer...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Please don't forget to apply direct pressure to the wound for the next thirty seconds.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Liv turns silently and climbs toward the next wounded soldier.'}
{3: 'After a while, the Construct squads finally arrive at the battlefield.'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: "Wait, isn't this area already abandoned? Why are there so many life signals?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: '1 heavily wounded medic, and... 35 treated soldiers...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'They were all... treated by this one medic?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Quick... We have to save her.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'Her vitals are stable now. The temporary consciousness container is also active. Wake her.'}
{2: 'Experiment Researcher', 3: "In order to save you, we'll need to modify you into a Construct."}
{2: 'Researcher', 3: 'We need your consent. Based on data I collected from your cognitive analysis—'}
{3: 'The researcher speaks up as if Liv is having trouble hearing.'}
{2: 'Experiment Researcher', 3: "Yes, you deserve to live more than so many people. That's it. Any other questions?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: "Hello, ma'am. Pardon me, but is this Liv's home?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Father', 3: "The battle's over. What's a soldier doing here...", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: "No, ma'am. Liv was seriously wounded in battle and was in critical condition... but she is making a stable recovery.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The man says solemnly, rubbing his head.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier', 3: 'In the last battle, Miss Liv has saved over thirty lives on the battlefield by herself—', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Soldier', 3: "Therefore, she has been awarded a first-class military accolade and has been promoted to lieutenant. She's a crowning achievement in the next generation of soldiers from leaders of the medical research center.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "Here's a picture and letter your daughter sent you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Brother', 3: "Think I'll have a chance to earn a first-class military accolade like Liv?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The man opens the letter, revealing a picture attached to it.'}
{3: 'The portrait shows Liv in a military outfit, the "Star of Life" medal on her chest gives her a gallant gleam.'}
{2: 'Sister', 3: "Liv was jealous of my dress, so I gave it to her... Now, it's my turn to be jealous...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The scene in the doorway draws a crowd.'}
{2: 'Pedestrian', 3: 'How did you raise such an outstanding daughter?'}
{3: "The family opens Liv's handwritten letter, and her brother reads it out loud for everyone."}
{3: "Hearing this, Liv's foster mom covers her mouth with her back to the children, hiding her expression."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Mother, Father, I brought honor to our family. I hope you're proud of me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Sis, thank you for the dress. Too bad I didn't have too many opportunities to wear it in the military...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "But I'll always keep it safe in my dresser and cherish it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Brother, my time in the med corps has taught me the importance of technical support from the medical research center—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Advancement in technology have saved more people than we have. Father's work really is important. I hope you learn a lot from him.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I have a new home now. I won't be able to come back and live with you all anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'But for the days ahead, I will still protect you and everyone on the battlefield.', 4: '1'}
